page.title: 19A day in the life of.......
page.content: In the morning I get up and get dressed and by that time it is 9.45. After that I have breakfast. I have Shreddies and a bit of marmalade on toast. Later I call for Christopher Wells and Carl and Martin come out. Sometimes we go down Haugh Lane and climb trees. We climb trees for two hours and then I have lunch. I have a snack like soup or a hamburger. Then I stay in for a while - about an hour. Later I go out but nobody is there so I watch T.V., but nothing good is on so I start a Lego ship, but halfway through I hear somebody outside so I go out and we play football but most of the time it is unfair, then I go in for tea. Most of the time I have chips. Then I watch a video like Cannonball Run. Then I go to bed. { {Scott Walker, age 9. St. Mary's.}
